criteria: All ACLs and Record Rules implemented as per US-070. Automated security tests pass. Manual E2E tests for each role confirm UI restrictions.
bypass_criteria: Not bypassable. Critical for system security.

criteria: End-to-end e-invoice generation successfully demonstrated in the GSP sandbox. Sync-to-async fallback mechanism tested and verified. PDF report is compliant.
success_metrics: 100% success rate for e-invoice generation in sandbox tests.

criteria: All P0/P1 bugs resolved. Performance benchmarks met. Successful migration dry-run completed and signed off. All users trained.
success_metrics: Formal sign-off from all business stakeholders for go-live.
